amendment.description: Amendment protects sections 1113 and 1114 in the bill from points of order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to protect sections 1113 and 1114 from possible points of order.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 195 (Roll no. 69).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole (OK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
